docs.text:
Welcome to the CVTeque API Documentation


Overview


This documentation describes how to use the API.


The API contains data about Users, Collaborators, Skills and Experience of the apps. The app is deployed to Heroku at  
https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/
.


It handles resources with routes such as 
GET
, 
POST
, 
PATCH
 or 
DELETE
.


The API is powered by 
Vapor
, a Swift server side framework.


Vapor utils commands




vapor xcode
 - Regenerate the API project and download dependancies.


git push heroku master
 - Deploy the changes which have been commited to the Heroku server.




Project layout


App/
    Controllers/
        UserController          # Routes methods of User.
        CollaboratorController  # Routes methods of Collaborator.
        SkillController         # Routes methods of Skill.
        ExperienceController    # Routes methods of Experience.
    Model/
        User            # Entity of the User.
        Collaborator    # Entity of the Collaborator.
        Skill           # Entity of the Skill.
        Experience      # Entity of the Experience.
Run/
    main.swift  # The main Swift file where the Droplet is configurated
docs.title: Home
Welcome to the CVTeque API Documentation

docs.text: This documentation describes how to use the API.  The API contains data about Users, Collaborators, Skills and Experience of the apps. The app is deployed to Heroku at   https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/ .  It handles resources with routes such as  GET ,  POST ,  PATCH  or  DELETE .  The API is powered by  Vapor , a Swift server side framework.

docs.text:
App/
    Controllers/
        UserController          # Routes methods of User.
        CollaboratorController  # Routes methods of Collaborator.
        SkillController         # Routes methods of Skill.
        ExperienceController    # Routes methods of Experience.

docs.title: Project layout

docs.text:
User


Details


User is the class that is responsible to manage all the users that are registered in the app, it regroups some generic properties such as identity, e-mail, etc.


Properties








Field


Type


Description










firstName


String


The first name of the user






lastName


String


The last name of the user






compagnyName


String optionnal


The compagny name where is working the user






ldap


String optionnal


The LDAP identifier of the user if exists






email


String


The e-mail address of the user








CRUD Operations


All parameters required by routes of the API need to be passed as JSON format


Read all users


GET


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/users



Read a specific user


GET


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/users/:id



EXAMPLE USAGE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/users/99



PARAMETERS








Field


Type


Description










id


Int


The user's ID you want to see.








Create a user


POST


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/users



EXAMPLE OF JSON


{
    "firstName":"Anthony",
    "lastName": "Roani",
    "compagnyName":"Wordline",
    "ldap":"",
    "email":"anthonyroani@gmail.com"
}



Update a user


PATCH


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/users/:id



EXAMPLE USAGE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/users/99



PARAMETERS








Field


Type


Description










id


Int


The user's ID you want to update.








EXAMPLE OF JSON


{
    "firstName":"Anthony",
    "lastName": "Roani",
    "compagnyName":"Genesis groupe",
    "ldap":"",
    "email":"a.roani@genesis-groupe.com"
}



Delete a specific user


DELETE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/users/:id



EXAMPLE USAGE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/users/99



PARAMETERS








Field


Type


Description










id


Int


The user's ID you want to delete.

docs.text:
Employee


Details


employee is the class that is responsible to manage all the employees associated to a User. 


Properties








Field


Type


Description










trigram


String


The trigram of the employee (
ARI
 for example)






availableDate


String


The date when the employee ends its mission








CRUD Operations


All parameters required by routes of the API need to be passed as JSON format


Read all employees


GET


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees



Read a specific employee


GET


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees/:id



EXAMPLE USAGE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees/99



PARAMETERS








Field


Type


Description










id


Int


The employee's ID you want to see.








Create an employee


POST


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees



EXAMPLE OF JSON


{
    "trigram":"ARI",
    "availableDate": "12-06-2017"
}



Update an employee


PATCH


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees/:id



EXAMPLE USAGE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees/99



PARAMETERS








Field


Type


Description










id


Int


The employee's ID you want to update.








EXAMPLE OF JSON


{
    "trigram":"DLI",
    "availableDate": "18-09-2018"
}



Delete a specific employee


DELETE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees/:id



EXAMPLE USAGE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/employees/99



PARAMETERS








Field


Type


Description










id


Int


The employee's ID you want to delete.

docs.text:
Skill


Details


Skill is the class that is responsible to manage all the skills of the collaborators in the app.


Properties








Field


Type


Description










name


String


The name of the skill






color


String


The hexadecimal string of the color






level


Int


The collaborator's level in the skill








CRUD Operations


All parameters required by routes of the API need to be passed as JSON format


Read all skills


GET


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/skills



Read a specific skill


GET


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/skills/:id



EXAMPLE USAGE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/skills/99



PARAMETERS








Field


Type


Description










id


Int


The skill's ID you want to see.








Create a skill


POST


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/skill



EXAMPLE OF JSON


{
    "name":"Swift",
    "color":"#F4F4F4",
    "level":5
}



Update a skill


PATCH


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/skills/:id



EXAMPLE USAGE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/skills/99



PARAMETERS








Field


Type


Description










id


Int


The skills's ID you want to update.








EXAMPLE OF JSON


{
    "name":"C#",
    "color":"#FEB6A5",
    "level":2
}



Delete a specific skill


DELETE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/skills/:id



EXAMPLE USAGE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/skills/99



PARAMETERS








Field


Type


Description










id


Int


The skills's ID you want to delete.

docs.text:
Experience


Details


Experience is the class that is responsible to manage all the experiences associated to a Collaborator. 


Properties








Field


Type


Description










trigram


String


The trigram of the collaborator 
(example: 
ARI
)






availableDate


String


The date when the collaborator ends its mission. 
Format is 
DD-mm-yyyy
.








CRUD Operations


All parameters required by routes of the API need to be passed as JSON format


Read all experiences


GET


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/experiences



Read a specific experience


GET


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/experiences/:id



EXAMPLE USAGE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/experiences/99



PARAMETERS








Field


Type


Description










id


Int


The experience's ID you want to see.








Create a collaborator


POST


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/experiences



EXAMPLE OF JSON


{
    "trigram":"ARI",
    "availableDate": "12-06-2017"
}



Update an experience


PATCH


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/experiences/:id



EXAMPLE USAGE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/experiences/99



PARAMETERS








Field


Type


Description










id


Int


The experience's ID you want to update.








EXAMPLE OF JSON


{
    "trigram":"DLI",
    "availableDate": "18-09-2018"
}



Delete a specific experience


DELETE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/experiences/:id



EXAMPLE USAGE


https://cvteque.herokuapp.com/experiences/99



PARAMETERS








Field


Type


Description










id


Int


The experience's ID you want to delete.
